issue.title: [CF 438] Custom color for Icons
issue.body:
This is a screenshoot of my TMW Groups:

Each group with a "Display"-prefix contains only meta-icons which shows any of the icons setup in the groups with the "Data"-prefix. An example can be seen here, which shows my Groups 14 & 15

Seeing my group 20 & 21, i've setup some Icons for the raidzones in there, and display them in my group 16. However: To be able to color these raidicons, i would have to put them in one of my data groups (1-7) or introduce new groups ie. Data (4.3 Dragonsoul) (red) ect. and put the icons displayed in group 16 there.

Both soultions would work, but i'm not really satisfied with both of them. I'd prefer seeing a color tab added to the icon editor, which would make my groups 1-7 obsolete


> Posted by CurseForge user Twister | Imported from CurseForge issue #438 | Raw
